Play.Header: MIA wins the coin toss and elects to defer. NE elects to Receive, and MIA elects to defend the north goal.

(6:44) 12-T.Brady pass short middle to 83-W.Welker for 9 yards, TOUCHDOWN. NE 12-Brady 48th straight regular season game with a TD pass, 2nd longest all-time (Unitas 47). Also 1st player in NFL history to throw a TD pass in all 16 games for 3 straight seasons. NE 83-Welker 110th consecutive game with a reception.
